summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 6th Avenue Southwest from West Spokane Street to a point approximately 830 feet south of the south margin of West Spokane Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, all accordance with Resolution No. 9658 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
